titles.title: To extend the temporary reduction of duty on yarn of combed cashmere or yarn of camel hair.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/24/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on yarn of combed cashmere or yarn of camel hair.
